body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on Spellcraft checks made to identify a spell being cast and a +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against arcane spellcasters. Members of this race only gain this bonus against creatures that use spells, not against those that only use spell-like abilities.
name: Magehunter
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Magehunter
